name: Good Boy (Miikka)
description:
Take a nice walk with your dog and solve some puzzles.

1 or 2 player (on same keyboard) puzzle game, where you walk your dog, hit ferns with stick and solve maybe some mysteries.
Both characters interact differently with the environment, so feel free to explore your options.

walkactionDOGWASDSpaceHUMANarrow keysEnter

This is a small project ideally for 2 players to do some puzzle solving together.  THERE IS NO MULTIPLAYER, only shared keyboard old-school fun.

Any feedback is welcome ans appreciated <3
